about_the_game:
Your family fortune is kaput and all you're left with is this super strict (and super sexy) maid with her huge mommy milkers and juicy ass, which are enough to drive any man insane. Its only made worse when she insists on ripping up your priceless fap material, claiming that it is just distracting you from becoming a “productive member of society". YUCK!

One day, that all changes. You return home from university, braced for a lecture from Kiriko, but instead she informs you she has penciled in regular baby-making sessions since you have to keep that family line going somehow. Since you don't have a girlfriend that she knows of, Kiriko steps in. Time to show her what you’re made of and teach her not to underestimate the cock of a visual novel protagonist!

Erase that cold attitude of hers one cream-pie at a time, as you fuck Kiriko over and over again, turning her into the perfect slut that is truly Maid for your pleasure~


  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • Your maid, Kiriko, is fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 15 scenes of master on maid action.

Maid for Pleasure is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

** PLEASE NOTE **
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: Time for your scheduled baby-making session!
IS this what the kids call "twerking"
This little piggy went to the bedroom

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.
- This game contains scenes of sexual content where characters provide dubious consent.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

name: Maid for Pleasure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

short_description: Having your own personal maid seems like a dream come true, except she is super strict and keeps ripping up your fap material …that is until you fuck her, of course. Then you can spend your days in absolute bliss, having each and every need attended to by your slutty devoted maid, Kiriko!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
